name: Wigglytuff
description: The Balloon Pokémon. Its body is very elastic. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.description: This Pokémon adds its proficiency bonus to damage rolls while poisoned, burned, confused, or paralyzed.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: Upon entering a battle, a single opponent’s held item is revealed, if it has one.
